WorkItem.Description:
Hello,
Â 
as I know by now, it's a known issue of Rawr v2.219 that the Gem chart is not accessable. My problem right now is, that the optimizer uses gems I dont want him to use (Dragon Eye's) and I can't tell him not do that. Shall I download an older version of Rawr and change the gem settings there, or is there any other workaround?
WorkItem.Summary: No access to the gem-chart - how to change the gems the optimizer uses?

Comments.Message:
The gem chart is accessible just don't click on the top level link. Instead click on any of the sub menus. This is fixed in the next version.

Meantime your issue is probably your gemming templates. Click on Tools | Gemming Templates and untick Jewelcrafter gems.
Thank you for your response, somehow I now can't find the Dragon Eye's but that's OK.
Do you have them filtered out? Also, check Tools > Edit Gemming Templates, if you've got JC gems enabled there.
